start.success: You are successfully subscribed to receive messages from the bot.

stop.success: You have successfully unsubscribed from receiving messages from the bot.

help.success:
Available commands:
/start ‚Äî> subscribe to receive messages.
/stop ‚Äî> unsubscribe from receiving messages.
/info ‚Äî> get information about the bot.
/help ‚Äî> display this message.
help.successForAdmin:
Available commands:
======== Regular user commands ========
/start ‚Äî> subscribe to receive messages.
/stop ‚Äî> unsubscribe from receiving messages.
/info ‚Äî> get information about the bot.
/help ‚Äî> display this message.

========= Admin user commands =========
/startWhaleman ‚Äî> activate Whaleman trading bot.
/stopWhaleman ‚Äî> deactivate Whaleman trading bot.
/statusWhaleman ‚Äî> print current status of the bot.
/getOpenOrders ‚Äî> print currently opened orders.

startWhaleman.success: Sended request to start the Whaleman bot.
startWhaleman.failed: You have not enough right to start the Whaleman

stopWhaleman.success: Sended request to stop the Whaleman bot.
stopWhaleman.failed: You have not enough right to start the Whaleman

statusWhaleman.success: Sended request to get status data from Whaleman bot.
statusWhaleman.failed: You have not enough right to see Whaleman's status

getOpenOrders.success: Sended request to get opened orders from Whaleman bot.
getOpenOrders.failed: You have not enough right to see opened orders.
getOpenOrders.botStopped:
Currently Whaleman bot stopped.
To view open orders, it is necessary to launch the bot.
Use -> /startWhaleman
getOpenOrders.noData:
Currently, We have no data about opened orders.
Please wait a second and repeat command /getOpenOrders
